title: [Perie's Magic Shoppe]
[Perie's General Store]
description: A gold and crimson wyvern tapestry hangs on one of the white brocade walls, and a high arched ceiling rises overhead.  A worn rug sits in one corner of a knotty pine floor.  There is an elegantly carved oak armoire on one side of the shop and a plain wooden table on the other.
